about_the_game:
Kaiten is a turn-based tactical combat game where luck and skill collide! Spin the wheel of fortune and lead your pawns to victory in intense 1v1 battles.

Your pawns are your warriors on this battlefield, but they're only as strong as the perks you equip them with. Build your collection of powerful perk cards and create devastating combinations that can turn the tide of any battle.

Will you emerge victorious in this dance of fortune and tactics? Step into the arena and let the wheel decide your fate!

SPIN THE WHEEL

  • Each turn begins with a spin of the wheel, determining your action. Will you land on a devastating attack, a powerful item, or a game-changing special move?

COMMAND YOUR PAWNS

  • Lead your line of pawns in tactical combat. Each pawn can attack their opposing enemy, but choose your targets wisely - your decisions can mean the difference between victory and defeat!

COLLECT AND COMBINE PERKS

  • Build your strategy by collecting powerful perk cards. Each perk brings unique abilities and bonuses to your pawns. Combine them wisely to create devastating combinations!

TACTICAL ITEMS

  • Unleash powerful items at the perfect moment! Use the Knife to double your damage, Split to divide your pawn's health and revive fallen allies, and more strategic tools to turn the battle in your favor!

BEST OF THREE MATCHES

  • Prove your worth in intense best-of-three match series. Each victory brings rewards to expand your perk collection!

Whether you're a tactical genius or a lucky spinner, Kaiten offers a unique blend of strategy and chance that will keep you coming back for more!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Each spin of the wheel brings new opportunities - will you land on a devastating attack, a game-changing item, or a tactical special move? Your fate awaits at the turn of the wheel!
